Fassone to Sky: "These are great days [in Cardiff]. We have examples of teams that managed to come back in a reasonable time."

Fassone: "Mercato? We went around Europe in these famous 8-9 months and spoke with clubs and agents. Mirabelli did a great job."

Fassone: "When we met with Montella we presented an advanced situation. I promised to deliver 70-80% by the start of preseason, we go ahead"

Fassone: "Jorge Mendes? We came to Cardiff for the game but the entire world of football is here."

Fassone: "We met with Mendes, he represents big names. Let's see what we can do."

Fassone: "Morata is a great player. Real Madrid is the only club we didn't have a face to face approach with. We look forward to next week."

Fassone: "Donnarumma? The situation is transparent and clear, Donnarumma is the pillar on which we would like to build the future of Milan."

Fassone: "He [Gigio] knows this and we have demonstrated it with a big sacrifice that the player deserves."

Fassone: "The ball is in Donnarumma's court, I hope that at 18 he knows the right path to take and we asked him to respond quickly."

Fassone: "We cannot start the season with a goalkeeper with an expiring contract. I trust that the decision will arrive in coming few hours"

Fassone: "Milan will take important steps to return competitive, we have shown that. We hope Donnarumma understands that."

Fassone: "The players we discussed with Mendes? We know which positions we want to reinforce, we spoke in depth re: some players and we hope that someone from these players arrive."

Fassone: "Juventus seem to me more mature than few years ago, it will be a great game. I cannot say who is stronger between the two teams."

"Inter" intends to change the name of the home arena


Milan "Inter" is considering the possibility of changing the name of the stadium San Siro (note officially - Giuseppe Meazza), writes Goal Italia. The management of Nerazzurri expects to agree with the municipality of Milan, which now owns the rights to the arena.


Such agreements bring additional financial injections into the club, which exists in many clubs around the world. In Italy, this is realized from Sassuolo (Mapei Stadium) and Juventus (Alliance Stadium).


It is noted that even in case of permission from the city authorities for Suning, the name should not affect the home matches of Milan.
